DOC.HEADLINE: DEALS : COMPANY TOWN
DOC.TEXT: * New Media : Media companies tired_of waiting for interactive television are suddenly flocking to the Internet , a global computer_network with an estimated 20 million users , as a distribution medium for new digital services . Sony Corp . of America said Thursday that it plans to start an on-line computer service next month to be available free through the Net , initially offering music industry news from Sony Music Entertainment.Other services , to be drawn from all_of Sony ' s entertainment divisions , will be available later this year . Separately , New York Times Co . said it plans to produce an on-line sports network to provide news and tips . Earlier this week , the company said it would test listing of employment advertising on the Internet . AMY HARMON
